argumentText:
ARGUMENT
h

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frgpup.b | |- B = ( Base ` H ) |
| 2 |  | frgpup.n | |- N = ( invg ` H ) |
| 3 |  | frgpup.t | |- T = ( y e. I , z e. 2o |-> if ( z = (/) , ( F ` y ) , ( N ` ( F ` y ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | frgpup.h | |- ( ph -> H e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | frgpup.i | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 6 |  | frgpup.a | |- ( ph -> F : I --> B ) |
| 7 |  | frgpup.w | |- W = ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 8 |  | frgpup.r | |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) |
| 9 |  | frgpup.g | |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) |
| 10 |  | frgpup.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 11 |  | frgpup.e | |- E = ran ( g e. W |-> <. [ g ] .~ , ( H gsum ( T o. g ) ) >. ) |
| 12 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( H e. Grp -> H e. Mnd ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> H e. Mnd ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. W ) -> H e. Mnd ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fviss | |- ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) C_ Word ( I X. 2o ) |
| 16 | 7, 15 | #P_eqsstri | |- W C_ Word ( I X. 2o ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_sseli | |- ( g e. W -> g e. Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_frgpuptf | |- ( ph -> T : ( I X. 2o ) --> B ) |
| 19 |  | #P_wrdco | |- ( ( g e. Word ( I X. 2o ) /\ T : ( I X. 2o ) --> B ) -> ( T o. g ) e. Word B ) |
| 20 | 17, 18, 19 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. W ) -> ( T o. g ) e. Word B ) |
| 21 | 1 | #P_gsumwcl | |- ( ( H e. Mnd /\ ( T o. g ) e. Word B ) -> ( H gsum ( T o. g ) ) e. B ) |
| 22 | 14, 20, 21 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. W ) -> ( H gsum ( T o. g ) ) e. B ) |
| 23 | 7, 8 | #P_efger | |- .~ Er W |
| 24 | 23 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> .~ Er W ) |
| 25 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) e. _V |
| 26 | 7, 25 | #P_eqeltri | |- W e. _V |
| 27 | 26 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> W e. _V ) |
| 28 |  | #P_coeq2 | |- ( g = h -> ( T o. g ) = ( T o. h ) ) |
| 29 | 28 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( g = h -> ( H gsum ( T o. g ) ) = ( H gsum ( T o. h ) ) ) |
| 30 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_frgpuplem | |- ( ( ph /\ g .~ h ) -> ( H gsum ( T o. g ) ) = ( H gsum ( T o. h ) ) ) |
| 31 | 11, 22, 24, 27, 29, 30 | #P_qliftfund | |- ( ph -> Fun E ) |
| 32 | 11, 22, 24, 27 | #P_qliftf | |- ( ph -> ( Fun E <-> E : ( W /. .~ ) --> B ) ) |
| 33 | 31, 32 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> E : ( W /. .~ ) --> B ) |
| 34 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) = ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 35 | 9, 34, 8 | #P_frgpval | |- ( I e. V -> G = ( ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) /s .~ ) ) |
| 36 | 5, 35 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G = ( ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) /s .~ ) ) |
| 37 |  | #P_2on | |- 2o e. On |
| 38 |  | #P_xpexg | |- ( ( I e. V /\ 2o e. On ) -> ( I X. 2o ) e. _V ) |
| 39 | 5, 37, 38 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> ( I X. 2o ) e. _V ) |
| 40 |  | #P_wrdexg | |- ( ( I X. 2o ) e. _V -> Word ( I X. 2o ) e. _V ) |
| 41 |  | #P_fvi | |- ( Word ( I X. 2o ) e. _V -> ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) = Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 42 | 39, 40, 41 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) = Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 43 | 7, 42 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> W = Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 44 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) ) = ( Base ` ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) ) |
| 45 | 34, 44 | #P_frmdbas | |- ( ( I X. 2o ) e. _V -> ( Base ` ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) ) = Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 46 | 39, 45 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) ) = Word ( I X. 2o ) ) |
| 47 | 43, 46 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> W = ( Base ` ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) ) ) |
| 48 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( ~FG ` I ) e. _V |
| 49 | 8, 48 | #P_eqeltri | |- .~ e. _V |
| 50 | 49 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> .~ e. _V ) |
| 51 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) e. _V |
| 52 | 51 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) e. _V ) |
| 53 | 36, 47, 50, 52 | #P_qusbas | |- ( ph -> ( W /. .~ ) = ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 54 | 53, 10 | #P_syl6reqr | |- ( ph -> X = ( W /. .~ ) ) |
| 55 | 54 | #P_feq2d | |- ( ph -> ( E : X --> B <-> E : ( W /. .~ ) --> B ) ) |
| 56 | 33, 55 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> E : X --> B ) |
